QueryText: asked about onion cultivation ?
KCCAns: Take 20 kg of nitrogen, 20 kg of phosphorus and 20 kg of potash on onion crop. After this, give 20 kg of Nitrogen per acre in 1 month. It is important to give regular water to the onion crop. During the Kharif season, after the interval of 10 to 12 days, during the summer rabi season, after 6 to 8 days, give irrigation water to the land.

QueryText: asked about onion cultivation ?

QueryText: COCONUT VARIETTY
KCCAns:
West Coast Toll (Banwali) - Every tree grown with an average yield of 80 to 100 fruits.

Lakshadweep Ordinary (Chandrakalpa) - A full grown tree yields an average of 150 fruits.

Pratap - The size of coconut is medium, round and the tree sprouts in six to seven years. 150 grams of coconut from this kind of tree.

Filipino Ordinary - Coconut is very big in size. Coconut has an average production of 105 coconut.

Crouch

Orange darf, green darf and yellow dahl are strained from color. Orange Dart is the best way to go for the caste.

QueryText: asked about water management
KCCAns: After harvesting of onion it is ready for harvesting from 3 to 4.5 months. The onion layer of yellow onion grows yellow in yellow and yellow onion. This is called breaking the neck. After degradation of 60 to 75 percent, consider that the onion extract has matured. The kadali breeders should loose the surrounding lands and take out the onions. After 4 to 5 days after harvest, onion powder should be kept in the farm in small dhagy form. Then cut the onion and mud. Cut off the stomach by placing a stalk of 3 to 4 cm in length. After that, onion should be dry in the shade 4 to 5 days

QueryText: asked about fruit drop on coconut
KCCAns: 5 percent nymphole 5 minutes for pest control Ltd Or economy plus 10 min. Ltd Equally mixed with water should be given thrice in a year during April to May, October to November, January to February. Do not remove the coconut for 45 days after giving the medicine, and also give 10 kg neem cake, zinc, boron, molybdenum and copper 200 gm per plant per year.

QueryText: farmer wants to know about seed treatment of gram crop?
KCCAns:
Seed treatment

Disease Control:
1. To protect crop from boiling and root rot, treat 2g of thyme by 1 gm of carbendazim, per kg of seeds. Or
2. Treat beta wax with 2 grams / kg.

Pest Control:
1. Treat thymethoxem 70WP 3 gms / forts at the rate of seed
 

Seed Treatment -

To provide nutrients
Bacterial culture: Rhizobium and P. S. B. Treat every 5 grams of quantity per kg at the rate of the seed.
2. Make a solution in half a liter of 100 grams of jaggery, heat the lukewarm solution and cool down to mix one packet rhizobium culture.
3. Sprinkle the solution evenly over the seed and mix it slowly with the hand so that the culture sticks to the top of the seed.
4. Dry the treated seeds for some time in the shade.
5. P.S.B. Seed treatment from culture like Rhizovium culture.
6. Treat molebdenum at the rate of 1 gram per kg seed.

QueryText: asking about fertilizer dose for mango?
KCCAns: One-year-old plant should be able to dug a 15 kg compost manure, 150 gm of nitrogen, 50 grams of phosphorus, 100 gms, at the beginning of the monsoon rains. Every year, by increasing this quantity in equanimity, every plant should be given 50 kg compost manure, 1.5 kg nitrogen, 500 gm phosphorus and 1 kg polyash buds in June for each plant.

QueryText: asking about fertilizer dose for mango?
KCCAns: One-year-old plant should be able to dug a 15 kg compost manure, 150 gm of nitrogen, 50 grams of phosphorus, 100 gms, at the beginning of the monsoon rains. Every year, by increasing this quantity in equanimity, every plant should be given 50 kg compost manure, 1.5 kg nitrogen, 500 gm phosphorus and 1 kg polyash buds in June for each plant.

QueryText: asked about attack of stem borer.
KCCAns:
Vegetable fruit and pebbles in the wild usually cause 40 percent of the pests. If neglected and sprayed properly, this loss can go up to 80%. This larvae enters the leaf stalks, tamarind, flora or fruit and pours it inside.

Eight to ten generations of pests are completed year after year. The larvae that enters the egg enters the stool and then into the stems from the main vein of the leaf. Pestily roasted insects look dry after drying completely.

QueryText: asked about water management in gram
KCCAns: gram is a very sensitive crop. Green gram requires about 25 cm of water. After sowing, give a light water. So the germination was good. In the medium soil should be given about 25 to 30 days. After 45 to 50 days, the second water and the third water should be given after 65-70 days if required. Sprinkle the soil according to the fudge and the necessary.

QueryText: ASKED ABOUT CUSTARD PLANTING?
KCCAns:
Planting

Prior to the monsoon, for the cultivation of Saitaalla, see the magda clay of 0.60 by 0.60 to 0.60 meter in the month before the monsoon. 5 bets should be taken 5 meters away. If planted at 5 bi 5 m, the plant will occupy 400 trees. Prior to the rains of hectare hectare, fill with cowpea, single super phosphate, poeta and soil. Thymet 10g should be used in Bangdi mode. For this, half a ton of hectare of farming requires 200 kg of single super phosphate. After this, after planting the rocks, the plant should be cultivated in the monsoon.

QueryText: asked about Potato Planting  Selection Information ?
KCCAns:
Potato Planting  Selection Information: Choose certified pests and diseases. Use government funding infrastructure, or buy it from National Seed Corporation (National Syed Corporation).



Potatoes have grown full and sprouted on it. Puddle should be thick and well-fed. In the dark space, well-grown shoots are dried. If the veneer is kept in the bedroom, they should be kept in a well ventilated place for 8 to 10 days before impregnation and keep them in good light for better sprout. Generally, it is worthwhile to use 25 to 30 gm weight of 5 cm diameter for whole egg (uncut), generally for egg-shaped cultivation. It is very useful for large sized cultivation. If there is a large sized potato, then weigh it at 25 to 30 gm, and it should be 2 to 3 eyes. It is very important to break the grille and the germs on the spleen as well. Sprinkled spoons should be planted after drying for 10 to 12 hours.

If the veneer is kept in the bedroom, they should be kept in a well ventilated place for 8 to 10 days before impregnation and keep them in good light for better sprout. Generally, it is worthwhile to use 25 to 30 gm weight of 5 cm diameter for whole egg (uncut), generally for egg-shaped cultivation. It is very useful for large sized cultivation. If there is a large sized potato, then weigh it at 25 to 30 gm, and it should be 2 to 3 eyes. It is very important to break the grille and the germs on the spleen as well. Sprinkled spoons should be planted after drying for 10 to 12 hours.

QueryText: Seeds and seed processing
KCCAns:
Seeds and seed processing

For more wheat production, there should be 20 to 22 lakh hectares of trees in the field. For this, 1oo kg of seeds per hectare should be used for sowing time.

Due to low temperature for late sowing, due to low wheat foliage the seed should be kept in the ratio of 125 to 150 kg per hectare. Seed treatment should be used for seeding of 75-100 kg per hectare.

Before sowing, seeds should be processed in the quantity of Captain or Thayaram fungicide with 3 gm per kg seed. Similarly, seeds of seed processing should be done for seeds of Azotobacter and phosphorous dissolving bacterial culture of 250 grams per 10 kg seed. This will increase the product by 10 to 15 percent.

QueryText: HARABHARA LAGAWAD?
KCCAns:
Time of planting of grams of grams

Sowing should be done in the soil with enough moisture in the soil, ie September to September or till 1o. After the sowing of grapes, the late monsoon fall in the beginning of September or early October is good for the germination and growth of the germ. Seed should be sown in deep (10 cm) area in the cumin area. Due to the convenience of irrigating the area, water should be sown from October 20 to November 10. Also, if the sowing is done on less room (5 cm) of graphene in the horticultural area. If the sowing is delayed, the low temperature is very low and germination is delayed and reduced. Crop reduces crop growth, loss of flowers and losses. For this, it is necessary to make sure that sowing is done on time and for the cultivation of gardens. The difference between the two line spacing is 3o cm. And the difference between two plants is 10 cm Sowing should be done in such a manner, so that the number of seedlings per acre is obtained.

QueryText: farmer want to know about harvesting of mentha crop?
KCCAns: Mentha harvesting is often done twice. On approximately 100-120 days of first harvesting, buds are started in plants. Planting should be done on the ground surface of 4-5 cm 0. Do another cutting, on approximately 70-80 days of first harvesting. After harvesting, leave the plants in open sunlight for 2-3 hours, then after drying the cut crop in the shade, remove the oil from the machine by the early distillation method.

QueryText: farmer want to know about mentha fertilizer ?
KCCAns:
Quantity of fertilizer

Generally, the use of fertilizers is beneficial on the basis of soil testing recommendations. In normal conditions, for good yield of mentha, use 120-150 kg nitrogen 50-60 kg of phosphorus 40 kg potash and 20 kg @ sulfur per hectare. Use of full quantity of phosphorus, potash and sulfur and 30-35 kg nitrogen sowing / transplanting should be used in ponds. The remaining nitrogen should be given at about 45 days of sowing / transplanting, but on 70-80 days and 20 days after first harvesting.

QueryText: farmer wants to know about safed musli varieties?
KCCAns:
Various species / varieties of white muesli
Various species of muculi are preserved such as chlorophytum borevalyanum, chlorophytum tuberose, chlorophytum arundenium, chlorophytum attenutam, chlorophytum brevskapam etc. But most of the availability of cholofitum borivalyanum and tuberose in the jungles of Madhya Pradesh is similar. The main difference between these two is that in tuberosum, a thread is similar to the crown, and after that its thickness increases, while in borivilionum, the thickness of the finger of the tuber is higher or the whole finger is thicker or It decreases downwards. Since it is difficult to remove peel in the context of tuberosum, it is not considered suitable for cultivation, mostly chlorophytum boreivalanum is cultivated.

QueryText: farmer want to know information about sowing time of bengal gram ?
KCCAns:
Sowing Time -



In uneven stage, sowing should be done by the second week of October.



The cultivation of gram is done even after harvesting of paddy, in such a situation, the sowing should be made till the middle of December.



The yield decreases after more delay in sowing. And there is a possibility of more outbreaks of gram flour in the crop. Therefore, the first week of October is best for sowing.

QueryText: Farmer want to know fertiliser  dose of  gram  ?
KCCAns:
Fertilizers should be used on soil testing basis only.

Nitrogen stabilization bacteria are found in the glands found in the roots of gram plants, which absorb the nitrogen from the atmosphere and use this nitrogen to make the plants grow.

To achieve good yield, use 20-25 kg of nitrogen 50-60 kg phosphorus 20 kg potash and 20 kg per hectare per hectare.

Scientific research has shown that in the unstructured condition, 2 percent urea or DAP Spray on the crop increases the yield of gram.

QueryText: farmert want to know the field prepartion in aloe vera crop
KCCAns: Plant transplant: After placing one or two plains of land, make the plant flat by placing the field. After this, plant the plants at high distances in 50:50 cm distance. Use planting small plants, which contain four to five leaves, coming out of the main plants for transplanting plants. If the distance from line to line 50 and plant length of plant is 50, 45,000-50,000 plants will be needed for transplantation. In the critical condition, its transplantation is best in February, however you can apply it anytime.

QueryText: Farmer needs information regarding WATER MANAGEMENT in pea crop?
KCCAns:
Field should have adequate amount of moisture at the time of sowing.
Pre- sowing irrigation is a must if soil does not have enough moisture at sowing.
Irrigation just after sowing results in poor germination due to formation of hard crust and impediment in the emergence of plant.
Second and third irrigations are recommended at flowering and at pod filling stages, as per requirements.

QueryText: Fertilizer dose in Garlic crop?
KCCAns:
Compost and fertilizer- The quantity of fertilizers and fertilizers depends on the fertility of the land. Generally, 20-25 tonnes of cow dung or compost per hectare or 5-8 tonnes of Vermicompost, 100 kg / ha. Nitrogen, 50 kg Phosphorus and 50 kg Potash is required. 175 kg for this Urea, 109 kg, di ammonium phosphate and 83 kg Mutant of potash is needed. Dung manure, D.A. The full quantity of P. and potash and half the quantity of urea should be mixed in the land during the final preparation of the field. The quantity of remaining urea should be given with spraying after 30-40 days in a standing crop.
Using the amount of micronutrients increases yield in the yield. 25 kg Gink sulphate should be used once per year in 3 years. Using drip irrigation and fertigation, the yield increases with the use of water-soluble fertilizers through drip irrigation.

The full quantity of P. and potash and half the quantity of urea should be mixed in the land during the final preparation of the field. The quantity of remaining urea should be given with spraying after 30-40 days in a standing crop.
Using the amount of micronutrients increases yield in the yield. 25 kg Gink sulphate should be used once per year in 3 years. Using drip irrigation and fertigation, the yield increases with the use of water-soluble fertilizers through drip irrigation.

QueryText: farmer want about onion field preparation ?
KCCAns: Plant preparation - Important contribution of proper plant management and transplantation onion crop. Plant of about 0.05 hectare area is sufficient for transplanting in 1 hectare. For this, plow 5-6 times of the farm so that the lumps get broken and the soil becomes turbid and can hold the water well. Before the preparation of the land, remove the remaining parts of the last crop, weeds and stones. During the last plowing, add half-ton well mixed cow dung to 0.05 hectares and mix well with the soil. 10-15 cm for the nursery Height, 1m As per width and convenience, the lengths should be drawn in length.

QueryText: asked about attack of mealy bug
KCCAns: Cleanliness is important before debris and branches. His pups climb up to the dug. For this, take a plastic strip of 15 to 20 centimeters in width and apply it to Greece. The bandage should be stacked, so the chicks stuck to Greece and died. Research has shown that malignant pests of the cryptolymus motrogeny have led to effective kidney pests. For this, leave 1000 to 1500 gooseberries per acre in the evening along the way. In the garden friends should not use harmful pesticides.

QueryText: asked about attack of mealy bug
KCCAns: Cleanliness is important before debris and branches. His pups climb up to the dug. For this, take a plastic strip of 15 to 20 centimeters in width and apply it to Greece. The bandage should be stacked, so the chicks stuck to Greece and died. Research has shown that malignant pests of the cryptolymus motrogeny have led to effective kidney pests. For this, leave 1000 to 1500 gooseberries per acre in the evening along the way. In the garden friends should not use harmful pesticides.

QueryText: asked about yield and harvesting of Carrot ?
KCCAns: carrot harvesting can be done in 70 to 90 days after the sowing of seeds. irrigate crop for 15 to 20 days before harvesting. Cut the leaves from the carrots and wash them with water. Separate small cargo sizes. The production of the carrot produces 8 to 10 tons of hectare.

QueryText: ASKED ABOUT CULTURAL PRACTICES FOE GRAM ?
KCCAns:
Varieties- VISHAL (WILT REJISTANT), seed ratio - 65 to 70 kg / ha, sowing SPACING kept at 30 x 10 cm.

Seed Treatment - Before sowing, mix 2 gm of thyrum powder + 2gm Bavistine or 5 g trichoderma and 25 g of rizobium and PSB mixed with cold dilution.

fertilizer dose -before sowing 25 kg of nitrogen and 50 kg phosphorus per hector.

QueryText: asked about seed treatment
KCCAns:
Seed ratio and seed processing:

Recommended for 10 kg of seed. For the prevention of bacterial disease, use 300 mesh sulfur at the rate of 4 g per kg, and in case of late planting, seed treatment should be done for chemotherapy (70%) 3 gm. When planting sorghum for the fodder, a single 16 kg seed should be 30cm in two lines. Keep it drenched.

QueryText: asked about seed treatment

When planting sorghum for the fodder, a single 16 kg seed should be 30cm in two lines. Keep it drenched.

QueryText: herbicide?
KCCAns: Plant Growth Regulator Herbicides: These groups contain 2, 4-D weedificants. The weedicides of this group are mainly used in the management of post emergence, ie after frying it, it is used in the management of broad leaf weeds in one group crops. But if used incorrectly or in improperly, they can harm single-crop crops. These weedicides weaken weed cells by interrupting hormones, proteins, etc. in different parts of weeds, so they die after spraying in very short span.

QueryText: asked about vareities of cluster bean ?
KCCAns:
Pusa Evergreen - It is growing upright and tall and it is recommended for summer and kharif season. These breed pods are 12 to 15 cm long, while the legumes are green, fresh and unbinned. Beginning of groundnut begins 45 to 55 days.

Pusa nayabahar - It gives good yields during both summer and kharif season. Peanuts are of 15cm long greenish green color. There is a direct increase of the trees. The leaf is a ghost of groundnut.

Pusa Seasonal - This product is good for kharif season and the breed of this breed is 10 to 12 cm long and it can be harvested in 75 to 80 days. The beans are attractive, shiny, greenish. In this species, the branches should be broken in a large quantity and the pods reach the top of the main trunk and branches.

Sharad Bahar - The tree is tall, the tree has 10 to 14 branches. Pendants are attractive, soft, rosarous, long-lived. This is suitable for Kharif season.

KCCAns: Pineapple can be planted in the region of humid tropics. If the environment and temperature are nutritious, this crop can be successfully planted in the area along the coastline along the coastline. QueryText: cultivation tomato
KCCAns:
Planting

Seeds should be sown on the bed up to make seedlings. Before preparing the bed plant, make sure to double the soil by placing 2, 3 cloves of the cluster and fry the land. Gadi wafa is 1m The width should be 3 meters long and 15 cm tall. Grind 1 gram Fenugreek, mix 50 grams of soyafa and make the steam flat with the hand. Before sowing, wash 3 grams of thyroid fungicide. Planting of seeds should be planted with parallel fingers by cutting the waist and covering it with soil. Water should be provided with fenugreek leaves. After coming out of seed, after 10 to 12 days, give two grams of pearl in two rows and give 10 gram frontlets per foot. Keep the steam watered. To control the flowering and crushing disease, spray 15 days after seedling with 12 to 15 ml monochrotocos and 25 gm of diaethene-M-45 in 10 liters of water. The next two sprays should be done at intervals of 10 days. After 25 to 30 days of sowing, ie after seedling height of 12-15 cm, seedlings should be restored to the entire world. Give water to the vapor a day before planting the seedlings. Therefore, the seedlings are not easily damaged due to the roots of the seedlings. Planting of plants should always be done in the evening or after they are low.

Before sowing, wash 3 grams of thyroid fungicide. Planting of seeds should be planted with parallel fingers by cutting the waist and covering it with soil. Water should be provided with fenugreek leaves. After coming out of seed, after 10 to 12 days, give two grams of pearl in two rows and give 10 gram frontlets per foot. Keep the steam watered. To control the flowering and crushing disease, spray 15 days after seedling with 12 to 15 ml monochrotocos and 25 gm of diaethene-M-45 in 10 liters of water. The next two sprays should be done at intervals of 10 days. After 25 to 30 days of sowing, ie after seedling height of 12-15 cm, seedlings should be restored to the entire world. Give water to the vapor a day before planting the seedlings. Therefore, the seedlings are not easily damaged due to the roots of the seedlings. Planting of plants should always be done in the evening or after they are low.

QueryText: FERTILIZER OF ONION ?
KCCAns:
At one time 300 kg of neem cake, 2.5 granary super phosphate, 30 kg potash, 2 bags of ammonium sulphate, 10 ton of fertilizer and 10 microns in need of fertilizer should be given at the time of cultivation, give two bags of ammonium sulphate 1 to 2 times at intervals of 1 month.

120 kg of urea, 320 kg of super phosphate and 80 kg of mutant of potassium should be given in the steam before planting for onion crop.

- 30 days after cultivation and 50 days after the second and third installment of 120 kg of urea should be given.

QueryText: asked about fertilizer dose for onion ?
KCCAns:
fertilizer dose for onion- 

Take 50 kg of nitrogen, 50 kg of phosphorus and 50 kg of potash on onion crop. After this, give 50 kg of Nitrogen per hectare in 1 month. It is important to give regular water to the onion crop. During the Kharif season, after the interval of 10 to 12 days, during the summer rabi season, after 6 to 8 days, give irrigation water to the land.

QueryText: asked about fertilizer dose
KCCAns: The dryland crop gives all nitrogen and phosphoric acid in a single installment before sowing. Horticultural crops produce half the quantity of nitrogen and full quantity of phosphoric acid and potash, during the sowing and remaining half the quantity of nitrogen, after 30-45 days after sowing (after crop 50-60 cm high) It is preferable to give chemicals in the area in which rain is assured and there is the possibility that the land will be kept till the requirement of jowar crop is completed or the plant has the facility of giving water after fertilization. Otherwise they do not offer such fertilizers.

       Generally, sowing of native greenbushes should be done by Prabhari or Tiffani. Keep the sowing distance to 30 x 10cm.



For small grains (eg flowers, G-12) - 60 to 65 kg / ha.



For moderate grains (Vijay) - 65 to 70 kg / ha.



For tip-and-grains (Faith, Digvijay, Virat) - 100 kg / ha.

QueryText: pod borer ?
KCCAns:
Control of pod borer

1) Larky eggs can be seen on the spleen stalks or on the rear of the nearest page alone or in the cluster. Small larvae break out in 5 to 7 days. This condition is the most dangerous. If this condition is controlled, then the next two sprayers can be read.

2) Spraying of neem extract 5% or chloropyriphos 17 ml per 10 liters of water for control. Quinnolphos or prophnofos mixed with 20 ml per 10 liters of water, make 50% of the crop during flowering and pods. When feeding the seeds, sprinkle the amamacetene benzoate with 4 grams per 10 liters of water, if the increase of groundnut is increased along with the aloe vermicelli.

QueryText: FARMER ASKED ABOUT MANGO STEM BORER ?
KCCAns:
To control these pests, the sharp edges of the pests will be destroyed.

Borer mixture (1 part carbonated sulphide + 1 part kroosiate oil) should be closed with the help of pitching.

Put the cane rod in the hole of the tree and take out the weevil or the worm. After that, petrol or phenolver 5 ml Or diclorovos 20 mL Mix one liter of water in it and put it in the hole. And turn off the hole soil.

QueryText: guava cultivation
KCCAns:
The good drainage of water for the cultivation of Peru, medium and light ground, is good. Choose the cast for cultivation. 60 x 60 x 60 cm at the distance of 6 x 6 meters for cultivation Dig the pits of size. Fill the pits with good soil, fenugreek and 1 kg of super phosphate. In the middle of the pothole plant the clay and support it with stick. Provide enough water to the vessels. Cover should be done in the forearm.



In the production and management of Peru Planting, shaping, turning, etc. are important. Sometimes the trees grow very thick and the trees grow very thick. Keeping the shape of trees such as pruning of trees before planting of trees, it should be kept in good shape, so that new sprout can yield good results, and in the garden the sunlight and the wind continue to play, thereby improving the quality of the fruit and reducing the disease. Chopping out the top of the floor is also important.

QueryText: Farmer want to information about seed treatment in chick pea ?
KCCAns:
Seed Treatment in chick pea -

To provide nutrients

Bacterial culture: Rhizobium and P. S. B. Treat every 5 grams of quantity per kg at the rate of the seed.

2. Make a solution in half a liter of 100 grams of jaggery, heat the lukewarm solution and cool down to mix one packet rhizobium culture.

3. Sprinkle the solution evenly over the seed and mix it slowly with the hand so that the culture sticks to the top of the seed.

4. Dry the treated seeds for some time in the shade.

5. P.S.B. Seed treatment from culture like Rhizovium culture.

6. Treat molebdenum at the rate of 1 gram per kg seed.

QueryText: Farmer want to know controll of purpal bloch of garlic ?
KCCAns: Purple Stain Disease (Purbal Irritation) With the effect of this disease, the leaves and stems on the upper part of the stem begin to become blurred and stains on the inside, causing the stem and leaves to fall apart. In February and April, the outbreak is high. Mankazab 2.5 grams / liters of water or cabandazim dissolve in 1 gram / liters of water and spray it twice a 15-day interval. Attach the disease-resistant varieties such as G-50, G-1 or G-323.

Buds 5-7 cm Should be covered in deep depth and covered with mild soil. Keeping the thin part of the buds above the seed while keeping the seed. QueryText: farmer want about phytopthora disease ?
KCCAns:
Prevention measures:
1. Choose the land with good drainage.
2. Choose the best resistant rootstock.
3. More irrigation and protection should be avoided.
4. The pen should be about 6 to 9 inches high above the surface of the soil during planting.
5. To protect the stem from moisture, double ring irrigation position should be used.
6. Bordeaux paste should be applied to the stem before and after the rain.

QueryText: farmer want to know information about varieties characters of Pusa Anmol of Wheat?
KCCAns: HI 8737 (`Pusa Anmol): A durum wheat developed at Regional station, Indore was released for timely sown irrigated conditions of Central Zone by Central Sub-Committee on Crop Standards, Notification and Release of Varieties of Agricultural Crops. The variety gave an average yield of 5.34t/ha with potential yield 6.7 t/ha. and is rich in ß-carotene and micronutrients like iron and zinc It showed good levels of resistance to Karnal bunt also.

QueryText: farmer want to know information about WATER MANAGEMENT in wheat?
KCCAns:
recommended for The crop requires 4 - 6 irrigations depending on the soil type and rainfall. Wheat crop requires minimum of 5 irrigations at the following critical stages.
I – Immediately after sowing
II – Crown root intiation : 15-20 DAS 
III- Active tillering stage : 35-40 DAS
IV- Flowering stage : 50-55 DAS
V- Grain filling stage : 70-75 DAS
Crown root initiation and flowering are the most critical stages. Water stagnation should be voided at the time of germination.

QueryText: farmer want to know mango disease management ?
KCCAns:
Mango Hapar
In February March, insect attacks. By which flowering blossoms and fungus arises.

 Mix one M.L drug of quinnalphus in one liter of water and sprinkle it.

Millibug

In February, insects sip juice from twigs and boars, from which flower buds flicker.
 Dust 200 grams of chlorpyriphs per plant per plant.

Malformations
The leaves of plants take on the form of flakes and the number of male flowers in the flower increases.

Cut the affected flower to two M.L. Spray the naphthalene acetic acid 2 times with a difference of 15 days.

QueryText: ASKED ABOUT PREAPERATION OF BORDEUX MIXTURE ?
KCCAns: One kg of copper sulphate powder is dissolved in 50 litres of water. Similarly, 1 kg of lime is powdered and dissolved in another 50 litres of water. Then copper sulphate solution is slowly added to lime solution with constant stirring or alternatively, both the solutions may be poured simultaneously to a third contained and mixed well.

QueryText: ASKED ABOUT BRINJAL VERITY ?
KCCAns:
MANJARI GOTA ; The breed is flat and flat, leaves are small to medium size. There are tropical leaves and fruit bones. Fruits are pale pink and there are white stripes on the fruit. The fruit size is round in the middle of the body. The fruits of these varieties are delicious to taste and after 4 to 5 days of harvest. Average production of hectare is 300 to 400 quintals.



Vaishali: This type of tree is booty and flat, the leaves are trunks on trunk and fruit cross. Fruits and flowers come from zombies. The color of the fruit is attractive purple and there are white border stripes on it. Fruits are medium-sized oval. Average hectare production is 300 quintals.

QueryText: ASKING ABOUT APPLE BOR PLANTATION ?
KCCAns: Planting of Apples Bore: - Usually in June these bore saplings are planted. Keep the distance between two trees and line 5 by 5 meters or 6 by 6 meters. To buy the ropes or prepare them manually. For the cultivation, dig a pavement of one and a half cubits and put one basket of manure, 250 gm of nitrogen, 500 gm phosphorus and 100 gm of potash, half a kilo lemon cake, 10 gm of ground. With a wild bore, the apple borrows the pen, and it fills the eye.

KCCAns: In chemical fertilizers, 150 kg of nephrons are in the form of 330 kg of urea. Is inserted at the rate of At half time of urea i.e. 165 kg during planting and remaining 165 kgs are added after 30 days of plantation, during the preparation of clay. 90 kilograms of phosphorus and 100 kilograms of potash per head. Is inserted at the rate of D.P. for phosphorus Use single or both of the single super phosphate. D.A.P. The quantity is 200 kg per ha. And the quantity of single super phosphate is 560 kg. And for potash, 170 kilograms of muriate of potash are copied. To rate

QueryText: Farmer want about wheat sowing time ?
KCCAns: Climate and land requirement for wheat -For the cultivation of wheat the need for temperate climatic conditions, it is considered suitable for cultivation, 20-25 degrees centigrade is suitable for sowing, wheat farming is mainly based on irrigation, which is considered to be the best land for wheat cultivation. But it can be cultivated in sandalwood, heavy loamer, matiyar and hay and cow's land. Based on the availability of resources, wheat can be cultivated in every kind of land.

QueryText: farmer want to know seed rate and sowing time of coriander crop ?
KCCAns: The right time for sowing of coriander for the grains is the first fortnight of November. The time of October to December time for green leaf harvesting is suitable for sowing. It is advisable to sow coriander in the second week of November, to protect against paddy. Seed rate: 15-20 kg / ha in irrigated condition. 25-30 kg / ha in seed and unincorporated Seeds are required.

QueryText: farmer want toknow how sesd treatment in chickpea crop ?
KCCAns:
Disease Control:

1. To protect crop from boiling and root rot, treat 2g of thyme by 1 gm of carbendazim, per kg of seeds. Or

2. Treat beta wax with 2 grams / kg.



Pest Control:

1. Treat thymethoxem 70WP 3 gms / forts at the rate of seed

 



Seed Treatment -Bacterial culture: Rhizobium and P. S. B. Treat every 5 grams of quantity per kg at the rate of the seed.

2. Make a solution in half a liter of 100 grams of jaggery, heat the lukewarm solution and cool down to mix one packet rhizobium culture.

3. Sprinkle the solution evenly over the seed and mix it slowly with the hand so that the culture sticks to the top of the seed.

4. Dry the treated seeds for some time in the shade.

5. P.S.B. Seed treatment from culture like Rhizovium culture.

6. Treat molebdenum at the rate of 1 gram per kg seed.

QueryText: farmer want to know information about WATER MANAGEMENT in wheat?
KCCAns:
recommended for The crop requires 4 - 6 irrigations depending on the soil type and rainfall. Wheat crop requires minimum of 5 irrigations at the following critical stages.

I – Immediately after sowing

II – Crown root intiation : 15-20 DAS 

III- Active tillering stage : 35-40 DAS

IV- Flowering stage : 50-55 DAS

V- Grain filling stage : 70-75 DAS

Crown root initiation and flowering are the most critical stages. Water stagnation should be voided at the time of germination.

QueryText: farmer want to know about Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana?
KCCAns: The premium under the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana is way less than the previous government or private crop insurance schemes. The premium amount for Kharif crops is 2 percent and 1.5 percent or the sum insured for Rabi crops. Karif and Rabi covers most food crops and oil crops cultivated in India. The premium for commercial or horticultural crops (including cotton) is pegged at 5 percent for one year.

farmer want about mustard water management ?
KCCAns:
Mustard:
If the mustard seed is given without bole, then first irrigation be done on 30-35 days of sowing. After this, if the weather is dry, i.e. 60-70 days of Bonnie, if the water is dry, then the irrigation must be done during the time of development of beans or pods. In the bifurcated area, where the mustard crop is cultivated in the irrigated condition, the first irrigation should be done on the 40-45 days of the sowing of the crop and on 75-80 days if the second irrigation is not available.

QueryText: farmer want about potato water mangement ?
KCCAns:
Irrigation
The saying is - potatoes and maize lick water - they do not drink. Therefore, giving a little water at a time at a time is beneficial for more yield. Because the quantity of compost is kept high, therefore 10 days after the implantation, but within 20 days, first irrigation must be done. By doing so, it will be very quick and the number of per plant tubers increases, which results in two fold increase in yield. By using the first irrigation timely, the fertilizer used in the field starts using crops as per requirement from the beginning. The time of the two irrigation seeds can be increased on the basis of the soil condition and experience of the soil. However, do not keep between two irrigation for more than 20 days. Stop irrigation 10 days before digging. By doing this, the tubers will clean at the time of excavation. Keep in mind that irrigation should be done only by half the drain in each irrigation so that the remaining part is solidified by risab

QueryText: Farmer wants to know information about WATER MANAGEMENT in wheat?
KCCAns:
Recommended for The crop requires 4 - 6 irrigations depending on the soil type and rainfall. Wheat crop requires minimum of 5 irrigations at the following critical stages.
I – Immediately after sowing
II – Crown root initiation: 15-20 DAS 
III- Active tillering stage: 35-40 DAS
IV- Flowering stage: 50-55 DAS
V- Grain filling stage: 70-75 DAS
Crown root initiation and flowering are the most critical stages. Water stagnation should be voided at the time of germination.

QueryText: asked about fertilizer dose.
KCCAns: For more product, you should supply balanced chemical fertilizers as follows. Mango crop requires nutritional supply from the time of planting. Nitrogen decay through dilution. Therefore, divide the amount of nitrates; But the entire phosphor and potash should be given at the time of sowing. If there is shortage of zinc in micro nutrients, then 20 to 25 kg zinc sulphate per hectare should be given at the time of sowing. At the time of sowing, five to seven cms of chemical fertilizers Mix well and soil well. In the vertical crop, the quantity of fertilizer (urea) is 10-12 cm from the maize line. Leave it at a distance.

QueryText: asked about water management
KCCAns: Tur is mainly due to kharif season and it increases on rain. However, if there is a break in the rain or if there is water stress and irrigation facilities, then give water to the stage of development of pakas (30 to 35 days), in flowering condition (60 to 70 days) and in the state of shagging. Therefore, there is an increase in crop production.
